title: Amdax Unveils Euronext-Bound Bitcoin Treasury Targeting 1% Supply – Europe’s MicroStrategy?
summary: Amdax has launched AMBTS, a Bitcoin Treasury company, and has prepared a Euronext Amsterdam listing with a 1% supply goal. The plan has echoed MicroStrategy’s playbook as public holdings have grown, while Bitcoin has slipped below $116K amid liquidations and mixed onchain metrics. The post Amdax Unveils Euronext-Bound Bitcoin Treasury Targeting 1% Supply – Europe’s MicroStrategy? appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Live Updates: Trump Says He’s Hoping to Meet With Putin and Zelensky Soon
summary: President Volodymyr Zelensky of Ukraine, whose last Oval Office meeting ended in acrimony, was expected to hear a plan from President Trump to cede land to Russia in exchange for security guarantees. Mr. Trump said he would call President Vladimir V. Putin of Russia after Monday’s meetings.

title: Trump floats US security guarantees for Ukraine in meeting with Zelenskyy
summary: President said US would be ‘involved’ in bolstering Kyiv’s postwar defences as he raised prospect of trilateral meeting with Putin

title: Substack writers can now direct US readers to (often cheaper) web-based subscriptions on iOS
summary: Substack's iOS app rolls out support for web-based payments, which can save subscribers money.
